techcrunch.title: One Year In, Nadella Is Planning Microsoft’s Long And Short Game
techcrunch.topComment: Great article, Tech Crunch. There's certainly a lot of glamorization of Apple these days, but thanks for taking the unbiased approach to clearly articulate Microsoft's short and long-term strategies. With enough hard work and a great amount of luck, ...
